headline: Mizuho Downgrades Applied Materials (AMAT) to Hold with a $170 PT Despite Strong Q3 Results
summary: Applied Materials Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is one of the best QQQ stocks to buy right now. On August 20, Vijay Rakesh from Mizuho Securities downgraded Applied Materials to a Hold, with a price target of $170.00. Preceding this announcement came the company’s Q3 2025 earnings report, where Applied Materials recorded a strong demand for semiconductor systems […]
